AI & ML Engineer with **First Class with Distinction** in B.E. (AI & ML). Experienced in computer vision, deep learning, and MLOps. Currently pursuing FastAI course and documenting my learning journey.
--- ## Education **B.E. Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning** P A College of Engineering, Mangalore | *2021 – 2025* **CGPA:** 7.33/10 (First Class with Distinction)
## Skills :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} **AI/ML** - Computer Vision - Deep Learning - Model Deployment - Data Science **Programming** - Python (Advanced) - SQL - Web Development ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} **Tools & Frameworks** - PyTorch, FastAI - Docker, Kubernetes - Git, Jenkins - scikit-learn **Current Focus** - FastAI Course - MLOps - Real-world Applications ::: ::::
--- ## Experience **AI DevOps Engineer - Intern** Rooman Technology | *Sep 2024 – Feb 2025* - Automated ML deployment pipelines using Docker & Kubernetes - Implemented CI/CD workflows, reducing deployment time by 30% - Designed scalable infrastructure for ML systems
--- ## Featured Projects **[Architectural Style Classifier](https://github.com/adilsiraju/Architecture-Style-Classifier/)** CNN-based classifier for 25 architectural styles with 73% accuracy. Deployed via Gradio for 500+ users. **[EcoVest Platform](https://github.com/adilsiraju/Ecovest)** Full-stack sustainable investment platform with impact metrics dashboard. **[Netflix Analysis](https://github.com/adilsiraju/Netflix-Userbase-EDA)** Comprehensive EDA providing actionable business insights.
--- ## Certifications - **CS50x** - Harvard University (2025) - **Python for Data Science** - IBM (2022) - **Computational Thinking** - University of Michigan (2022)
::: {.text-center} *"Continuous learning and practical application are the keys to mastering AI."* :::
